description: This file defines a React component called TaskList that renders a list of task items, each represented by the TaskItem component, handling properties like toggling, deleting, and updating tasks.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate, isBusy = false })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a list of tasks using TaskItem components, receiving tasks and callback handlers as props.
